titleStmt.title: To the king and both Houses of Parliament, (who have made laws and decrees, and caused them to be put in execution, to restrain and prohibit people from having the liberty of their consciences in the exercise of the worship of God) this is sent as a warning from the Lord.
titleStmt.author: Coale, Josiah, 1632?-1668.
Crook, John, 1617-1699.
England and Wales. Parliament.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)

notesStmt.note: Signed: ...Kingstone upon Thames the 5th of the 9th month, 1664 ... J.C. [i.e. Josiah Coale].
Attributed to John Crook by Wing.
Appears at reel 2638:23 as Wing (2nd ed.) item C4759.
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
